The Recipe For Success.

Mogpog International Culinary School, Inc. help students master cookery in a short period of time through total immersion.

View Courses Apply for Scholarship

Why choose MICS?

  • Students learn fast from MICS. Students quickly acquire the skills needed for a successful career in the culinary world.
  • Students train with head chefs with experience in different international cuisines.
  • Students benefit from MICS’ connections.
  • Graduates of MICS receive immediate job placement assistance.
  • MICS is the place to acquire the experience and credentials that give course into the food industry and the world over.

Let's hear from the students of MICS

“Hi! I’m Lauren Jessen. I was a student of MICS and I received a job in Manila after taking the Cookery NC II course. The course was very hands-on. The head chef took his time to each us everything we have to know for the fundamentals of professional cooking and have prepared us to enter the workplace quickly.”
